backend/main.mo: Actor managing order creation and retrieval with access control, storing orders in a map and enforcing user permissions.
backend/migration.mo: Migration module that initializes an empty orders map and resets nextOrderId for new deployments.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose of various frontend files for reference.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind base styles defining OKLCH color variables for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML entry point that mounts the React app and loads main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React layout composing header, sections, footer, and toaster for notifications.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Login/logout button integrating Internet Identity with query cache clearing.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteFoote: Footer displaying copyright info and a caffeine.ai attribution link.
frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeade: Responsive header with navigation, login button, and cart button for desktop and mobile.
frontend/src/components/menu/MenuFilters: Filter bar allowing search and veg/non‑veg toggles with clear‑filters support.
frontend/src/components/menu/MenuItemCar: Menu item card showing details, spice level, and an add‑to‑cart action with toast feedback.
frontend/src/components/menu/MenuSection: Renders the menu with category tabs, filters, and item cards, showing an empty state when no items match.
frontend/src/components/order/CartButton: Displays a cart button with item count badge and opens the cart sheet.
Shows cart contents with quantity controls, subtotal, and checkout flow, or an empty state if no items.
frontend/src/components/order/CheckoutDi: Handles order checkout, form validation, order submission, and shows confirmation on success.
frontend/src/components/order/OrderConfi: Displays a confirmation screen with order ID and timestamp after successful checkout.
frontend/src/components/orders/MyOrdersS: Shows user's past orders with loading, error, and empty states, requiring authentication.
frontend/src/components/sections/AboutSe: Presents an overview of the restaurant with feature cards highlighting its qualities.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Displays contact info including phone, service area, and business hours.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: A hero section displaying business info, call-to-action buttons, and a hero image with smooth scroll-to-menu behavior.
frontend/src/config/business.ts: Exports static business details including name, tagline, description, contact info, and operating hours.
frontend/src/data/menu.ts: Defines MenuItem type and provides menu categories and a large list of predefined menu items.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity, invalidating dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useCallerOrders.ts: Fetches caller-specific orders using the backend actor, enabled only when the actor is ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useCart.ts: Zustand store managing cart items with persistence and helpers for subtotal and item counts.
frontend/src/hooks/useCreateOrder.ts: Mutation hook that formats cart items, creates an order via the actor, clears the cart, and refreshes order data.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides context and logic for managing Internet Identity login, storage, and status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useMenuFiltering.ts: Implements search and veg/non-veg filters for menu items using local state and memoized filtering.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base with custom color variables and themes for light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider.
frontend/src/utils/money.ts: Utility for INR formatting and converting numbers to bigint for backend usage.
frontend/src/utils/orderMeta.ts: Handles saving and retrieving simple order metadata in localStorage.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers to read URL or hash parameters, persist them in sessionStorage, and clear them when needed.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Stores the project’s state, version, feature list, and metadata for a cloud‑kitchen website.
